name: Lee Lee
summary: A reliable and organised administrative professional with strong experience in office coordination, document management, and team support. Known for multitasking efficiently in fast-paced environments, maintaining accurate records, and supporting senior staff with scheduling, procurement, and reporting duties. Adept with Microsoft Office Suite, internal systems, and ensuring smooth daily operations.

experience.title: Administrative Assistant
details: Managed diaries and travel bookings for 4 senior managers, ensuring accuracy and timely arrangements.
Maintained internal files and procurement records, improving retrieval time by 30%.
Supported client onboarding process by preparing documentation, updating CRM systems, and coordinating meetings.

experience.title: Office Coordinator
details: Handled day-to-day office operations, including supplies ordering, equipment tracking, and visitor management.
Organised quarterly staff events and weekly internal meetings with full venue, catering, and AV support.
Collaborated with HR to update staff records, issue ID badges, and manage induction packs.

experience.title: Junior Project Administrator
details: Provided support to project managers across 3 concurrent client projects by tracking deliverables and updating project plans.
Created internal reports using Excel and PowerPoint for stakeholder meetings.
Ensured all project documentation was version-controlled and shared across teams via SharePoint.
